summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3675 , for the improvement of 21st Avenue Northeast, from East 61st Street to East 65th Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45314 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
